name: ExcuseList
0:
”Alexa ask excuse list for an excuse”
”give me an excuse”
”tell me a fun excuse”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: excuse list
des: Are you tired of saying no to your friends? Try this Excuse List application to generate fun excuses. We have over 100 excuses so you will never run out of excuses. Try it today!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
